short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App lets you quickly find and browse the web from your address bar!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hoolasearch replaces the default homepage of Chrome Browser and turns it into powerful personal new tab, you'd love to use evryday.

Turn your Chrome Startpage into the most powerful utility of your browser with Hoolasearch.

Always wanted to get a bit more from a chrome new tab? Our extension is here for you! Add, remove, replace and manage any of chrome new tab tiles. With Hoolasearch  you'll get a full control over your chrome new tab.

Thanks to the import and export function, your visual bookmarks will not disappear after reinstalling the browser or OS. This function also allows you to transfer saved bookmarks to other computers that also have Hoolasearch installed instead of the standard “new tab”.
